com.apple.eawt.event
Class GestureUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.eawt.event.GestureUtilities

public final class GestureUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Registration utility class to add GestureListeners to Swing components. This class manages the relationship between JComponents and the GestureListeners attached to them. It's design is similar to the Java SE 6u10 com.sun.awt.AWTUtilities class which adds additional functionality to AWT Windows, without adding new API to the Window class. To add a GestureListener to a top-level Swing window, use the JRootPane of the top-level window type.

Since:
Java for Mac OS X 10.5 Update 7, Java for Mac OS X 10.6 Update 2
See Also:
GestureAdapter, JFrame.getRootPane(), com.sun.awt.AWTUtilities
